definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: You have followed me for a long time, you're so good to me.
sentences.chinese: 你跟了我這麼久，對我有情有義，肝膽相照。

sentences.english: Du Xin said he wanted to make an affectionate and faithful old cafe here.
sentences.chinese: 他說，他想把這裏做成一個有情有義的老店。
